name: Ubwanga: The Rebirth
description:
You are rebirthed into the land of Ubwanga, a purgatory of sorts. To escape, you must harvest the souls of the lost. If you do not succeed, you may never wake.

This is Taylor Buchheit's entry for One Game a Month January. The theme was Rebirth.

WASD or arrow keys move you around the world. Left-Click to attack.
